C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"

containers.name: metrics
command:
password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
MYSQLD_EXPORTER_PASSWORD=${password_aux} /bin/mysqld_exporter --mysqld.address=localhost:3306 --mysqld.username=root

if [[ -f /opt/bitnami/scripts/rabbitmq/nodeshutdown.sh ]]; then
    /opt/bitnami/scripts/rabbitmq/nodeshutdown.sh -t "120" -d "false"
else
    rabbitmqctl stop_app
fi

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
